name: DeleteFolder
description: Deletes a folder from a given directory

inputs.name: folderTobeDeleted
inputs.description: Name of the folder which is to be deleted.

inputs.name: parentFolderPath
inputs.description: Source folder path from where folder has to be deleted

outputs.name: deletedFolderPath
outputs.description: Path of the folder which has been deleted

dependencies.name: os
dependencies.description: package which interacts with System OS
